snippet: As part of a drive to win women’s votes, Christine C. Quinn distributed a video of Gloria Steinem saying her election as mayor would inspire girls.
abstract: Trailside blog; Christine C Quinn, as part drive to win women's votes, distributes video of feminist icon Gloria Steinem saying Quinn's election as mayor would inspire young women.
lead_paragraph: As part of a drive to win women’s votes, Christine C. Quinn distributed a video of Gloria Steinem saying her election as mayor would inspire girls.

headline.print_headline: Steinem Makes A Video for Quinn
headline.main: Steinem Makes a Video for Quinn
